text: Milan Marković (; born 20 May 1979) is a Serbian football defender. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Niš Category:Association football defenders Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Radnički Niš players Category:OFK Niš players Category:FK Sileks players Category:FK Sinđelić Niš players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players
